#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{char ch[100005];long i;
	while(~scanf("%s",ch))
	{
		for(i=0;ch[i]!='\0';i++)
		 {
		 	if(ch[i]=='X')
		 	 cout<<"A";
		 	else if(ch[i]=='Y')
		 	 cout<<"B";
		 	else if(ch[i]=='Z')
		 	 cout<<"C";
		 	 else
		 	 {
		 	 	cout<<(char)(ch[i]+3);
		 	 }
		 }
		 cout<<endl;
		
	}
	
return 0;	
}
